item.title: Starting on the Python Challenges
item.description: Today shall be the official start to completing the Python Challenges by Pybites. Though technically I started it last week. Pybites has a long list of about 60 Python Challenges on their website, ranging from simple games to API calls for web servers. I think this is going to be a good opportunity to bring my Python skills to the next level, and hopefully inspire me to be able to start on my own personal project!
item.content:
Today shall be the official start to completing the Python Challenges by Pybites.

Though technically I started it last week.

Pybites has a long list of about 60 Python Challenges on their website, ranging from simple games to API calls for web servers. I think this is going to be a good opportunity to bring my Python skills to the next level, and hopefully inspire me to be able to start on my own personal project!

So far, I have completed 2 challenges but really have struggled with completing it within a single day each. Usually I take way too long and in the case of the 2nd challenge, I had to look at the solution because I couldn’t figure out the algorithm as well. But good start, this means that the challenges must be technically pretty tough. Hopefully this will really help me improve.

Cheers
